Text: A changelog would be nice if you put up so many versions.
googling it would be nice since you have the internet RIGHT IN FRONT OF YOUR FACE.
I was pointing out if you do a thing you do it right, it wouldn't hurt his hand to ctrl-c/v a changelog. Take it as a suggestion i have nothing with you (uploader).
